description: Coefficients in expansion of Sum_{n >= 1} x^n/(1-x^n)^4.
formula: a(n) = 1/6*(sigma[3](n) + 3*sigma[2](n) + 2*sigma[1](n)), i.e., this sequence is the inverse MÃ¶bius transform of tetrahedral (or pyramidal) numbers: n*(n+1)(n+2)/6 with g.f. 1/(1-x)^4 (cf. A000292). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 31 2002
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 27 2001
